---------------------------------------------------------------------
Rev. 1.0.3 - 2015-05-10
Added: class ExtractGif to extract gif frames (Not rendering, yet), the
       positioning and timing data is retained in the individual frames.
Added: proper LGPL 2.1 headers to source files
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Rev. 1.0.2 - 2015-05-01
Added: CreateGif. A simple Gif Animation creation script.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Rev. 1.0.1 - 2015-04-30
Fixed: Some Composer dependencies were pointing to development versions.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Rev. 1.0.0 - 2015-04-27
Initial release
